channel.title: Uskaarj General Topics
channel.description: Post general questions about the USkaarj staff, mod and other projects

item.title: did uskaarj for ut 99 get further than beta?
item.author: invalid@example.com (blobs ur uncle)
item.dc:creator: blobs ur uncle
item.content:encoded: I just downloaded v. 101 and was a little put off as it didn't have a single player mode. i realise this is an old mod but was wondering what other versions were made and if they are available anywhere?

item.title: umod problem
item.author: invalid@example.com (Utghost)
item.dc:creator: Utghost
item.content:encoded: When i downloaded the umod from the website i had umod fixed but instead of an ut99 version, after installing a demo of ut2k3 , i found it wasn't for ut99. It was for 2k3. How do i get uskaarj for ut99

item.title: BAT Files
item.author: invalid@example.com (GTD-Carthage)
item.dc:creator: GTD-Carthage
item.content:encoded: I try to start up USkaarj but my computer doesn't seem to do anything even after waiting out a few minutes. What things do I need to use or do to get BAT files running?

item.title: Man...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Moofis)
item.dc:creator: Moofis
item.content:encoded: Im a great fan of strategy games and i really want to try Uskaarj but its online only and NO one plays online. this sucks

item.title: feedback
item.author: invalid@example.com (DavidM)
item.dc:creator: DavidM
item.content:encoded:
hmmm, tested it.......for 10 minutes or so

its totally unplayable due to the camera moving as fast as a rotten snail
and I hardly see my units from some distance (and they spawn in a pillar of the building)

if that stuff is fixed it could actually be playtested, but atm it's unplayable for me

item.title: where is everyone?
item.author: invalid@example.com (maniac12ca)
item.dc:creator: maniac12ca
item.content:encoded: Why dont ya have more fans here? I think this mod looks great! Just saw release date was on the 13th and was tlakign to a friend. He said he'd get this mod and try it out to. Hope more people come when its released. Well, good luck and see-ya server side!

item.title: Some Ideas/questions for Uskaarj 2k3
item.author: invalid@example.com (BloodShed)
item.dc:creator: BloodShed
item.content:encoded:
im looking forward to the 2k3 version of your mod. I saw the pic's at planetunreal.com and they are awsome

ideas and questions (ideas might be formed as a question):

1) Will there be superweapons?
- if so will the ion/laser satalite or nuke missile be one of them?
- if so will there be an option for the server admin to turn them off?
- if there are nukes included wil it recquire a unit (like a star craft ghost) to paint the target?

2) how many unit will be included?...

Some Ideas/questions for Uskaarj 2k3

item.title: Beta Tester list
item.author: invalid@example.com (barnEbiss)
item.dc:creator: barnEbiss
item.content:encoded:
Beta Tester list

-dp-
Tycho
Isocryd
isophage
Mr.Mitchell


I have not heard back from the other people who are not on the list in a long time, so for you guys to be re added on the list and get the beta to test in the following days plz respond here, or you will be removed from the list for good. and I will look into getting more testers

item.title: 2k3 Map
item.author: invalid@example.com (Raven2409)
item.dc:creator: Raven2409
item.content:encoded:
i asked barn if i could make a map for Uskaarj 2k3, and he said sure


so i thought i would show a pic of my map



input is appreciated and i will have an in-game shot up as soon as i put some lighting in.

if this map fails for Uskaarj it will make one helluva DM map

item.title: Yeah ok :)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Killerman)
item.dc:creator: Killerman
item.content:encoded: I just got emailed by beyondunreal and they finally got me in lol.. Took them long enough sorry to say.. I just formated my computer and im not sure if im gonna download unreal again... But I may... I do like this mod alot so ill see what I can do.. Im still alive

item.title: Hello, I am the new coder
item.author: invalid@example.com ([SAS]Solid Snake)
item.dc:creator: [SAS]Solid Snake
item.content:encoded:
Hello everybody,

I've just been recruited by BarnEBiss into the USkaarj team, specifically coding. Hopefully I can help out in this area. Uhm ... should I do a bio in here?

item.title: Tactic
item.author: invalid@example.com (maniac12ca)
item.dc:creator: maniac12ca
item.content:encoded:
Here.s one that should hopefully wear the enemy down before they get to your base. This will be from the NEG veiw and is purly speaculation so far, untill i get to play. When we have it so there is no time limit, and resources are able to be gathered, try this. Start by doing what you should do at the start of any startagy game you play, make lots of gatherers. As soon as you have enough matierals make a build 2 or 3 research builidings, so research can get by faster, due to you being able...

Tactic

item.title: single player idea.
item.author: invalid@example.com (maniac12ca)
item.dc:creator: maniac12ca
item.content:encoded:
Ok,in lost temple how 'bout this.You,the humans, are assigned to clear out the temple and gain control of the new power generator built by the skaarj.(maybe skin it differently so it looks cool and different and give it lots of health) They know you're there,they know your coming,and you'll run into resistence every tunnel,every circle. some will be heavy,some will be weak.(like in circles maybe be alot of puepae or gasbags or skaarj or krall,easily wiped out by tanks maybe..dunno cause i...

single player idea.

item.title: 1 question...
item.author: invalid@example.com (jasdave)
item.dc:creator: jasdave
item.content:encoded:
Is there going to be an option to go to first person mode while battling? Or is this strictly an RTS mod?
Also- do you use the regular UT scaling? or have you made mostly every thing a bit smaller (units/ buildings) to make the enviroments seem larger?
